author: wtopstaff
title: Hurricanes-Sharks Sums
text:
2 1—5 
First Period_1, San Jose, J.Ward 3 (Marleau, Hertl), 1:21. 2, San Jose, J.Ward 4 (Burns), 8:32. Penalties_Thornton, SJ (hooking), 9:13; Goodrow, SJ (high-sticking), 13:10. 
Second Period_3, Carolina, Faulk 3 (Gerbe, Rask), 3:09 (pp). 4, San Jose, Pavelski 3 (Vlasic, Thornton), 6:08. 5, San Jose, Wingels 1 (Tierney, Martin), 9:09. 6, Carolina, Nash 1 (Hanifin, Versteeg), 10:43. Penalties_Dillon, SJ (tripping), 2:39. 
Third Period_7, San Jose, J.Ward 5 (Burns), 19:03 (en). Penalties_Versteeg, Car (hooking), 5:20. 
Shots on Goal_Carolina 7-12-15_34. San Jose 6-8-7_21. 
Power-play opportunities_Carolina 1 of 3; San Jose 0 of 1. 
Goalies_Carolina, Lack (13 shots-9 saves), C.Ward 2-5-0 (9:09 second, 7-7). San Jose, Jones 5-2-0 (34-32). 
A_15,814 (17,562). T_2:24. 
Referees_Mike Leggo, Graham Skilliter. Linesmen_Darren Gibbs, Don Henderson. Topics:
